not have to worry about the lack of food
for the new year so let's begin
you can either use pork or beef for this
recipe for pork the best cut should be
but shoulder or belly with the fat
attached if you have to use beef I
recommend using beef shank or back bar
carefully remove all the yellow fat that
attach to the beef shank
you can ask your butcher for the whole
piece of muscle added it will look more
beautiful when we put it in a jar to
cook the pork bring a saucepan of water
to a boil add some salt and a tablespoon
of vinegar you're going to apply the BOC
first the vinegar will help to reduce
the strong smell and also keep the pork
in a very bright color pop out for about
5 minutes until the impurities dry to
the top then remove and greens well you
also want to wash the pot clean after
that return the pork to the pot and then
filled with water enough to cover to
enhance the meat flavor we can add two
onion half and one or two smash shallots
you're going to boil the pork for about
30 to 45 minutes depending on how thick
the cutter part is keep the heat on
medium low and occasionally scheming up
the form when the pork is cooked through
transfer to an ice water bath this helps
to cool air faster and also maintain the
bright color
if you are using beef shank also boil it
with some salt instead of adding onion
and shallots we're gonna add some spices
such as star anise cinnamon or caramel
this spicy helped enhance the flavor of
the beef beef shank takes longer to cook
about one and a half to two hours
depending on the size if you use a

read order coming out that's mean is

Fissel ratio is one to one stir well to

low heat to have the sugar dissolve
faster some other recipes might say that
you should cook the fish sauce for
sometimes to reduce it a little bit but
I just don't like the ideas of boiling
fish sauce in my house because that
would make my kitchen stings for a few
days so just when the sugar is
completely dissolved turn off the heat
and let cool completely when the meat
has cooled out wipe it dry with some
paper towel and arrange in a jar only
pouring the fish sauce when the fish
sauce is completely cool insert some
bamboo skewers on top to press the meat
now keep it submerged in the liquid then
as a few garlic cloves and chilies if
your garlic is young make sure you
remove the core in the center also add
some crushed peppercorns and you are
done it can be eaten in three days and
you can keep it for a few weeks for the

some time so I will add a cup of vinegar

the rest of the steps are just the same
